"},{"text":"Enchantment Extractors","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Enchantment Extractors are used to remove enchantments from tools, weapons, and armour."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enchantment_extractors.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages:
["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"To create an Enchantment Extractor, arrange the following recipe in a dropper then drop an enchanting table on top of it:"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enchantment_extractors.2"}]},"

  ",{"translate":"block.minecraft.dropper"},"
      ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#7d4f00"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.book","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"book"}}},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#1c1c17"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.hopper","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"hopper"}}},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#7d4f00"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.book","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"book"}}},"
","      ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#7d4f00"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.book","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"book"}}},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#4f3505"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.writable_book","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"writable_book"}}},{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"☒","color":"#7d4f00"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.item.minecraft.book","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"book"}}}," ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"◼","color":"#c2194f"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.catalyst.block.minecraft.enchanting_table","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"enchanting_table"}}},"→ ",{"translate":"%1$s%3427656$s","with":[{"text":"█","color":"#7d0b2a"},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.crafting.display.block.gm4.enchantment_extractor","font":"gm4:guidebook","color":"white"}],"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_item","contents":{"id":"dropper","tag":"{display:{Name:'{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":["Enchantment Extractor",{"translate":"block.gm4.enchantment_extractor"}],"italic":false}'}}"}}},"

sections.name: page_2
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Dropping enchanted items on top of the enchantment extractor will unenchant it and has a chance to put enchanted books containing those enchantments into the extractor."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enchantment extractors.3"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The chance of extraction is lower for more powerful enchantments.

Some high level enchants may become cursed with vanishing.

If an extraction fails, a puff of smoke or a congealed enchantment (Vex) will appear."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.enchantment extractors.4"}]}]
